July 17, 1915 D Penygroes Contest (Class B)
Penygroes Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Penygroes Contest penygroes-contest-class-b
None
Sweet English Songs
Brynycwar Grounds, Penygroes, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. 4th annual contest promoted by Penygroes band. March contest - 1st Cwmaman, 2nd Ammanford. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 4, 2018, 5:08 p.m. Oct. 4, 2018, 6:09 p.m.

3 Rhosynberem David Williams
